content.text: Samantha invests \$600 at a rate of \(2\%\) per year simple interest
Calculate the interest Samantha earns in 8 years
Write down all the steps in your working
Jamie needs 300 g of flour to make 20 cakes
How much flour does he need to make 12 cakes?

Complete the statement about the amount of juice, \(j\mathrm{ml}\) , in the carton
Shade the required region in each of the Venn diagrams

Write down all the steps in your working

content.text: Write the following as a single fraction in its simplest form
\(y\) varies inversely as the square root of \(x\)
A model of a ship is made to a scale of \(\) 1:200\)
The surface area of the model is \(7500 \text{cm}^2\)
Calculate the surface area of the ship, giving your answer in square metres
Make \(y\) the subject of the formula

The length of the arc \(AB\) is \(4r\)
Find the area of the sector in terms of \(r\), giving your answer in its simplest form

The diagram shows the speed-time graph for the last 18 seconds of Roman's cycle journey
In the diagram, \(O\) is the origin

Find \(\mathrm{fg}(x)\), giving your answer in its simplest form
the angle between \(DP\) and the horizontal rectangle \(ABCD\)
The diagram shows a triangular prism
\(ABCD\) is a horizontal rectangle with \(DA = 10 \text{cm}\) and \(AB = 5 \text{cm}\)
